translation.en: You guys, just start without me.
translation.ja: みんな 先に始めてて
ようやく 内なる平和
戦いは500年前に 終わったはず

translation.en: Well, now I'm ready for a rematch.
500 years in the Spirit Realm, you pick up a thing or two.
translation.ja: “魂の王国”に来て500年だ 少しはマシになる

translation.en: I have taken the chi of every master here.
translation.ja: 今まで出会ったマスターの “気”を奪ったんだ

translation.en: And soon I will have your power, too.
translation.ja: 次は貴様の気をいただく

translation.en: When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
translation.ja: まだ分かりませんか？ 奪うほど失うのです

translation.en: With your chi, I will finally be able to return to the mortal world.
translation.ja: 貴様の気があれば おれは“肉体の王国”へ戻れる

translation.en: And this time, you won't be there to stop me.
translation.ja: しかも おれを止める貴様は もういない

translation.en: It was never my destiny to stop you.
translation.ja: あなたを止める役目でしたら

translation.en: I have set another on that path.
translation.ja: 別の者に託してありますよ

translation.en: Then I will find him... and take his chi, too.
translation.ja: では見つけ出して そいつの気も奪ってやる

translation.en: Justice is about to be served!
translation.ja: 我ら 正義を愛するマスター！

translation.en: We'll have two Justice Platters, please.
Oh, the spicy noodle soup for Tigress. Did you want extra sauce with that?
translation.ja: ピリ辛汁麺もね ソースは？

translation.en: She wants it on the side.

translation.ja: 龍の戦士　谷を守れ！

translation.en: You guys aren't doing the Dramatic Pose, are you?
Do we have to strike a pose every time we land?
You guys, never underestimate the power of a dramatic entrance.
translation.ja: 登場のインパクトは大切だよ

translation.en: I've heard about some masters who can win a fight just by throwing open a door.
translation.ja: 強烈な登場で 勝負を決める者もいる

translation.en: Really? I was just making, uh...
Yeah. I mean, yeah. I am.
Before the battle of the fist comes the battle of the mind.
translation.ja: “拳”の前に 心理戦は始まっている

translation.en: Nice dramatic entrance. What's the occasion?
translation.ja: 強烈な登場！ 何かあるんですか？

translation.en: Today will be my final class.
translation.ja: 今日が私の最後の稽古だ

translation.en: I didn't even know you were sick! Although you have been looking a little...
translation.ja: 病気なの？ 確かに ちょっと…

translation.en: A little healthy. A lot, actually.
My final class, because from now on your training will be in the hands
translation.ja: いいか　これから お前たちに稽古をつけるのは

translation.en: Me, teach? I mean, why not Tigress? She's always telling everyone what to do.
translation.ja: 仕切り屋の タイガーじゃなくて？

translation.en: -Be quiet, Po. -You see what I mean?
Tigress is not the Dragon Warrior. You are.
translation.ja: お前が龍の戦士だからな

translation.en: Come on, they're the Five. What could I teach them?
translation.ja: 相手は マスター･ファイブだよ

translation.en: There is always something more to learn, even for a master.
translation.ja: 何かしら 教えることがあるはずだ

translation.en: For instance, let me show you another move...
translation.ja: 例えば 私の新ワザを見よ

translation.en: All you have to lose is our respect.
translation.ja: 失敗しても 失うのは尊敬だけ

translation.en: I mean, seriously, how bad can it be?
translation.ja: きっとヘタじゃないよ

translation.en: Okay, okay. Let's switch it up.
I mean, ah... Tigress, Tornado Back Flip!
translation.ja: あれ… 竜巻後ろ跳び

translation.en: Crane, go high. I mean low! Low!
translation.ja: 上へ！ いや 下だ

translation.en: Viper and Tigress, do, like, a Totem Pole Poison Technique!
translation.ja: ヘビとタイガーは トーテムポールの…

translation.en: Uh, you two, do a Swarming Insect Bite
translation.ja: それから ２人 虫の大群が襲う感じで… ピリ辛の… 攻撃が…

translation.en: with a Yellow Tail, Yellow Jacket, Spicy Tuna...
translation.ja: 虫の大群が襲う感じで… ピリ辛の… 攻撃が…

translation.en: Did you at least learn a little something?
And Tigress is flammable, it turns out.
translation.ja: タイガーが燃えるってことも

translation.en: [goose 1] Yeah, that was a complete disaster.
translation.ja: 今日のアレは ひどかった

translation.en: [goose 2] Ugh... I'm glad we're not Po right now.

translation.ja: 今の話 聞かれたぞ

translation.en: Uh, he said you're a loser.
translation.ja: ダメ出ししたのは彼よ

translation.en: How was your first day teaching?

translation.ja: 屈辱的です 聞いた

translation.en: Who told you? Did Tigress tell you?
I heard from Monkey, and Crane, and Mantis, and your dad, and Mrs. Chow from the gift shop,
translation.ja: モンキー ツル カマキリ お前の父親 土産屋の店員

translation.en: and those ducks you just passed,
translation.ja: 今のカモたちに それから―
今のカモたちに それから― タイガーだ

translation.en: Did she also tell you that it'll never happen again? Because I'm done.
translation.ja: もう次は ありませんよ

translation.en: Both! I don't know why you ever thought I could teach that class.
translation.ja: 両方です　僕にはムリだ

translation.en: What? You set me up to fail? Why?
translation.ja: じゃ失敗させたの？ なぜ？

translation.en: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
translation.ja: できることばかりしていては 成長できない

translation.en: I don't wanna be more! I like who I am.
You don't even know who you are.
translation.ja: 自分を分かっていまい

translation.en: What do you... Of course, I do. I'm the Dragon Warrior.
translation.ja: 分かってますよ　龍の戦士だ

translation.en: And what exactly does that mean, Dragon Warrior?
It means, you know, just going around and punching and kicking.
translation.ja: 意味は… 分かるでしょ？ 悪党にパンチやキックして 谷を守る…
悪党にパンチやキックして 谷を守る… みたいな

translation.en: You think that is what the great Master Oogway saw for you?
translation.ja: それが 導師に 選ばれた理由だと思うのか？
500年 待ち望んだ龍の戦士は

translation.en: so you could spend your days kicking butt and running through town high-fiving bunnies?
translation.ja: 悪党を蹴散らし 勝利の ハイタッチをするだけか？

translation.en: Oogway saw greatness in you, Po. Against my better judgment.
translation.ja: 導師はお前の中に とてつもない資質を見た

translation.en: More than you can see in yourself. Incredible power awaits you.
translation.ja: 自分では気づいていないが 無限の力を持っている

translation.en: Power beyond anything you can imagine.
translation.ja: お前の想像を はるかに超える力だ

translation.en: The energy that flows through all living things.
translation.ja: 生きとし生けるものに 流れるエネルギーだ

translation.en: So you're saying if I teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that?
translation.ja: 師匠になれば僕にもできる？

translation.en: No. I'm saying if you teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that.
translation.ja: いや 私がスゴいことを 修行できるようになる

translation.en: Mastering chi requires mastery of self.
translation.ja: 気を操るには まず己を律するのだ

translation.en: Oogway sat alone in a cave for 30 years asking one question.
translation.ja: 導師でさえ洞窟に30年こもり 自問を続けた
自分は誰か？ 何者なのか？

translation.en: I'm lucky if I get five minutes before you interrupt...
translation.ja: お前がいると すぐ邪魔を…

translation.en: [groans] So now I have to sit alone in a cave for 30 years?
translation.ja: 僕も 30年 こもらなきゃダメ？

translation.en: Teaching? There's no way I'm ever gonna be like you.
translation.ja: お師匠様のようには なれないよ

translation.en: I'm not trying to turn you into me.
I'm trying to turn you into you.
translation.ja: お前を 本当のお前に したいのだ

translation.en: Turn me into me? Wait a second, that makes no...
translation.ja: 僕を僕に？ さっぱり分からない

translation.en: Almost there, Shifu. Just a little more confusing and you'll be the next Oogway.
translation.ja: 話の難しさは 導師にそっくりです！

translation.en: Sorry, no offense, Master Oogway. I just...
translation.ja: 悪口じゃありません ウーグウェイ導師

translation.en: I'll let you get back to your eternal peace.
If I stepped on you, would you die?
translation.ja: お前を踏みつぶしたら 死ぬか？

translation.en: You hear that, Oogway? I'm back.
translation.ja: ウーグウェイ おれは戻ったぞ
中国全土を掌握した戦国武将

translation.en: The Jade Slayer. Master of Pain.
translation.ja: “翡翠(ひすい)刀の達人” “痛みの伝道師”

translation.en: You may know me as the Beast of Vengeance.
Okay, I used to work with Oogway.
translation.ja: 昔 ウーグウェイの…

translation.en: -Oh, Master Oogway! -Master Oogway! Now, he was a great warrior.
translation.ja: 知ってる　伝説の戦士だ
もういい やかましい！

translation.en: Find Oogway's students, and bring them to me.
translation.ja: ウーグウェイの弟子を捜せ

translation.en: By the time I am done with them, Oogway,
translation.ja: 貴様の弟子どもを 始末すれば―

translation.en: there will be no one left who will even remember your name.
translation.ja: ウーグウェイの名を 伝える者はいなくなる
カイ様の世になるのだ！

translation.en: Teach me? Oh, no! It's the Dragon Teacher!
translation.ja: 稽古を？ 龍の師匠だ！

translation.en: Ah! No! Please don't teach me to death!
I was just, uh, stopping by for a little soak.
translation.ja: ちょっと風呂に入りに 寄ったんだ

translation.en: Nothing? I come home to find you taking a bath with your dolls...
translation.ja: 大きな息子が 人形遊びしてるのに？

translation.en: ...and instead of adding bath salts to the water, you just added Szechuan peppercorns.
translation.ja: しかも風呂に 四川唐辛子を入れてる

translation.en: There, there, son. You tell your daddy all about it.
translation.ja: 父さんに話してごらん

translation.en: Shifu says I don't know what it means to be the Dragon Warrior. Now I have to be a teacher?
translation.ja: “龍の戦士が分かってない ファイブに教えろ”って

translation.en: I thought I finally knew who I was. If I'm not the Dragon Warrior, who am I?
translation.ja: 龍の戦士じゃないなら 僕は誰なんだ？
カンフーを教えるのか？

translation.en: [exclaims] Po, that's a promotion! Take the job, son!
translation.ja: すごい出世だ 話を受けなさい

translation.en: And, someday when you're in charge of the whole Jade Palace I can sell noodles in the lobby!
translation.ja: お前が いつかトップになれば 翡翠城でラーメンを売れる

translation.en: Why are you still here taking a bath like a baby? Get out! Get up! Go, go, go!
translation.ja: 何してる？ 風呂から出て翡翠城へ戻れ
フランチャイズ拡大だ

translation.en: But what about the Dragon Warrior look-alike contest?
translation.ja: “龍の戦士 そっくり大会”は？

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Chow always wins that.
And the Dragon Warrior dumpling-eating contest? I have to defend my title.
translation.ja: “肉まん大食い大会”は？ 僕が王者だ

translation.en: No one's gonna beat your dumpling-eating record.
translation.ja: お前の記録は誰も破れん

translation.en: Someone's about to beat your dumpling-eating record!
I'm Li Shan. I'm looking for my son.
translation.ja: おれはリー･シェン 息子を捜しに来た
ああ 何年も前にだが

translation.en: You, too. I hope you find your son.
translation.ja: 息子さんが見つかるといいね

translation.en: And I hope you find your father.
Oh, my gosh, it is you!
Well, don't just stand there. Give your old man a hug!
I thought I lost you forever, Little Lotus.
translation.ja: もう会えないかと思ったぞ 小蓮(シャオレン)

translation.en: Uh, okay. This is very embarrassing but I think you've got me confused with a panda named Lotus. My name is Po.
translation.ja: パンダ違いだったみたい 僕の名前はポーだよ

translation.en: Oh, right, you wouldn't know. Okay.
translation.ja: そうか お前は… よし

translation.en: See, Little Lotus was the name you were given at birth.
translation.ja: シャオレンは 生まれた時の名だ

translation.en: I can't believe it! After all these years, you're really here? This is amazing!
translation.ja: 何年もたってから ここで会えるなんて

translation.en: Oh, Dad! Come! Say hi to...
I don't know what I'm supposed to call you.
translation.ja: 何て呼べばいいのかな

translation.en: I'm pretty sure he said his name is Li.
Thank you, thank you, for taking such good care of my son.
translation.ja: 息子を立派に育ててくれて ありがとう

translation.en: Your son? Now, hold on just a minute.
translation.ja: 息子？ ちょっと待ってくれ

translation.en: How do we know this stranger is even related to you?
translation.ja: 親戚だっていう証拠すら ないだろ

translation.en: Look at that. -Our bellies could be brothers! -That is so cool.
translation.ja: 見ろよ 腹だけなら双子みたいだ

translation.en: Hey, son, let me teach you how to belly gong.
-All right. Belly gong. -They jiggle the same!
Jiggle, jiggle, jiggle. [Li] It's like looking in a fat mirror.
translation.ja: 太って見える鏡みたいだ

translation.en: I can't believe we're taking a picture together.
But I still don't understand. I thought Po was the only panda left.
translation.ja: ポー以外 パンダは全滅したはずだ

translation.en: Oh, no. There's a whole bunch of us.
translation.ja: 実は たくさんいるんだ

translation.en: A secret panda village in the mountains.
translation.ja: 山に 秘密のパンダ村がある

translation.en: But how did you know where I was?
I received a message that led me here.
translation.ja: ここにいると知らせがあった

translation.en: How could you receive a message if no one could find you?
translation.ja: 秘密の村に そんな知らせが来るなんて―

translation.en: No, it was a message from the universe.
translation.ja: 突然 宇宙から来たんだ

translation.en: Now, what's all this about a Dragon Warrior?
translation.ja: それより お前はいつ龍の戦士に？

translation.en: How did you know I was a Dragon Warrior? Did the universe tell you that, too?
translation.ja: そのことも 宇宙から教わったの？

translation.en: No, the poster did. And the gift shop.
translation.ja: そのポスターと… 土産屋さんさ 湯のみを買った
土産屋さんさ 湯のみを買った

translation.en: You have no idea. There's so much to show you. You're gonna be so awesomely proud.
translation.ja: 見せたいものがあるんだ 自慢したくなるよ
ワシはもう自慢してるぞ

translation.en: Do you have panda asthma, too? Does that run in the family?
translation.ja: “パンダ喘息(ぜんそく)”持ち？ これって遺伝？
父さん きっと気に入るよ

translation.en: It's, like, the coolest thing ever.
This is the Hall of Heroes.
translation.ja: ここは“英雄たちの殿堂”

translation.en: Home of the most priceless kung fu artifacts in all of China!
translation.ja: 中国全土からのお宝がある
ここは なんというか…

translation.en: Awesome? Were you gonna say... You were gonna say "awesome," right? Because it totally is!
translation.ja: イケてる？ そのとおりだよ

translation.en: -Totally! -But be super careful. Everything's very fragile here.
Like the Urn of Whispering Warriors. Someone broke that once.
translation.ja: “ささやく戦士のツボ”は 前に割られて…
誰に？ どこかのアホ

translation.en: This is Master Flying Rhino's battle armor!
translation.ja: “空飛ぶマスター･サイの鎧(よろい)”

translation.en: I wonder if I could fit in that.
Get out of my head, Dad! I've wondered the same thing!
translation.ja: 僕も同じこと考えてた

translation.en: -If I could fit in it? -If you could? No, if I could fit.
translation.ja: おれが？ 僕が入るかね

translation.en: Master Ram's crossbow, the infamous Gate Smasher.
Dad, look at this! The battle helmets of Master Rat's army.
translation.ja: これ見て “マスター･ネズミ軍団の兜(かぶと)” ちっさい
“マスター･ネズミ軍団の兜(かぶと)” ちっさい

translation.en: Master Dolphin's waterproof armor! This is my favorite.
Check it out. It's the legendary battle rickshaw of Emperor Hawk.
translation.ja: これは “タカ皇帝の戦場用人力車”

translation.en: Dad, what are you doing? We're not supposed to touch anything!
translation.ja: 父さん 触っちゃダメだよ

translation.en: Oh! Sorry, sorry. Should I put it back?
translation.ja: すまん　脱いだ方がいい？

translation.en: [exclaims] How does it feel? Do the hinges hinge? Does it smell like rhino?
translation.ja: 関節は曲がる？ サイのニオイは？

translation.en: Does it feel like you're impenetrable?
Does it feel like you could take on a thousand warriors and emerge unscathed?
translation.ja: 1000人の敵兵が相手でも へっちゃらで戦えそう？
すごく いい気分だ

translation.en: Ooh! I wonder what this does. I should pull it.
translation.ja: これは？ 引っ張ってみよう

translation.en: I think I just peed a little.
Anything else we should try in here, son?
translation.ja: ほかに試してみるものは？

translation.en: Here we go! Go, go, go!

translation.ja: はい パス よし
来い マスター･サイ

translation.en: I'm gonna get you. I am gonna get you!
translation.ja: 捕まえるじょ～ 捕まえちゃる どうだ　捕まえちゃうぞ

translation.en: I'm gonna get you, I'm gonna get you! I'm gonna get you.
translation.ja: 捕まえちゃる どうだ　捕まえちゃうぞ

translation.en: Who's got you? Who's gonna get you?
translation.ja: 誰が捕まえる？ 誰だ？

translation.en: Who's gonna get you? Yeah. Who's gonna get you?
translation.ja: ほら 捕まえるじょ～

translation.en: You're never gonna guess who just showed up.
Not in a million years. You... You just try.
translation.ja: 100万年 考えても 当たらないよ

translation.en: Whoa! How did you just guess that?
Oh, wait a second. Yeah, of course. We look exactly the same.
translation.ja: ああ　そっくりだもんね

translation.en: Dad, say hi to my friends.
Mantis, Tigress, Monkey, Crane, and Viper.
translation.ja: カマキリ タイガー モンキー ツル ヘビ
ヘビさんだね？ モンキーです

translation.en: They're kind of my best friends. And this...
translation.ja: みんな親友さ そして シーフー老師
そして シーフー老師 伝説のね

translation.en: Uh... It is an honor to meet you, Master Panda.
translation.ja: お会いできて光栄です

translation.en: Perhaps your father would care to join us in the training hall.
Your son will be teaching the class.
I'm sure he's tired. I'm sure you're tired. He's tired.
I'm gonna show him to the Chrysanthemum Suite.
What, tired? No, I'm fine. I would love to watch you teach.
translation.ja: 元気だし お前が 教えるところを見たい

translation.en: Trust me, it'll be more fun just to watch me...

translation.ja: 何？ 谷が攻撃された

translation.en: This is perfect! Now you can see what being the Dragon Warrior's all about!
translation.ja: これを見れば 龍の戦士が分かるよ

translation.en: Enemies of justice, prepare for war!
translation.ja: 正義の敵ども 覚悟しろ～！

translation.en: What's the deal with the green guys?
It's okay, Dad, I do this every day!
translation.ja: 大丈夫　毎日やって…

translation.en: The Master Badger Twins, with their Crushing Double-Gong technique!
translation.ja: マスター･アナグマ兄弟の 同時粉砕棒だ

translation.en: And that guy is... No! Master Porcupine!
translation.ja: あっちは… マスター･ヤマアラシ！

translation.en: I thought he died a hundred years ago.
Get a quick sketch of us.
Did you get it? Did you get it?
Oh, I blinked. Can we get another one?
translation.ja: 目をつぶってる　もう１枚

translation.en: I'm being choked by Master Porcupine. This is so cool.
translation.ja: マスター･ヤマアラシに “首絞め”されて 最高…

translation.en: "Message from the universe." I'll give you a message from the universe.
translation.ja: 何が“宇宙からの知らせ”だ ワシの知らせを聞け

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. I'll clean up later.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Not my good pan!
Dad, check out my Dumplings of Doom.
Your chi will soon be mine.
Whoa. You're right. That's so scary.
We should try that, too. Maybe it'd be scary back at them.
Okay, but we gotta plan what we're gonna say first. Otherwise, it won't be scary. It'll just be stupid.
translation.ja: 内容を決めなきゃ バカっぽくなる

translation.en: It's not them talking, you idiots! It's me talking through them. Kai!
translation.ja: アホども！ 話しているのはカイ様だ
誰？ いいよ　分かった

translation.en: The green smoke, just poof! And then poof!
translation.ja: 緑の煙が ブワッて
カイ　カイ　カイ…
カイ　カイ… どこだ？

translation.en: There's so much wisdom in here, I can't find anything.
translation.ja: 資料が多すぎて… あった！

translation.en: All the answers will be found within.
translation.ja: すべての答えは ここに

translation.en: Are you kidding me? Not again.
translation.ja: また そういう展開？

translation.en: It is written in Oogway's hand.
translation.ja: ウーグウェイ導師の字だ

translation.en: "in arms. In arms." Sorry. He says, "Brother-in-arms."
Maybe you should just unroll it all at once?
"I was an ambitious young warrior leading a great army."
translation.ja: “当時の私は若く…” 大軍を率いており

translation.en: And fighting by my side was Kai...
translation.ja: 隣にはいつもカイがいた

translation.en: One day, we were ambushed. I was badly wounded.
translation.ja: ある日 奇襲に遭い 私は重傷を負ってしまった

translation.en: My friend carried me for days, looking for help...
translation.ja: カイは助けを求め 何日も私を抱えて歩いた

translation.en: until we came to a secret village high in the mountains.
translation.ja: そして山の奥深くに 秘密の村を見つけたのだ
古代より 癒やしの奥義が伝わる―

translation.en: Pandas who used the power of chi to heal me.
translation.ja: パンダたちは気功を使い 私の傷を治した

translation.en: They taught me how to give chi.
translation.ja: 気を与える方法も 教えてくれた

translation.en: But Kai wanted the power all to himself.
translation.ja: しかしカイは その力をすべて 我がものにしようとした

translation.en: He saw that what could be given could also be taken.
translation.ja: 気を与えられるなら 奪うこともできると…
我らの戦いは地を揺るがし

translation.en: until, finally I banished Kai to the Spirit Realm.
translation.ja: ついに私は彼を “魂の王国”へと追いやった

translation.en: Should he ever return to the mortal realm,
translation.ja: 彼が“肉体の王国”に 戻った時―

translation.en: he can only be stopped by a true master of chi.
translation.ja: 止められるのは 気功の使い手だけだ
気功の使い手… お師匠様

translation.en: Me? I can barely make a flower bloom. I need at least 30 more years, and a cave.
translation.ja: 私など 30年は 洞窟にこもらねばムリだ

translation.en: [Shifu] He will continue stealing the chi of masters until he has consumed it all.
translation.ja: カイはマスターを襲い 気を盗み続けるぞ

translation.en: [Viper] We have to think of a way to stop him!
translation.ja: カイはマスターを襲い 気を盗み続けるぞ 阻止する

translation.en: [Crane] He'll get more and more powerful with every master he defeats.
translation.ja: でも どんどん強くなっていく

translation.en: [Tigress] There is no choice. We fight.
That must be why the universe sent you here!
translation.ja: だから宇宙は 父さんをよこした

translation.en: Okay, so what do I have to do?
You have to come home with me.
Yes, son. You must rediscover what it is to be a panda.
translation.ja: まずはパンダというものを 実感しないとな

translation.en: You have to learn to live like a panda, sleep like a panda,
translation.ja: パンダのように生活し 眠りにつき―
ウォーミングアップだ

translation.en: I've always felt like I wasn't eating up to my full potential.
translation.ja: 僕も自分の力は もっとある気がしてた

translation.en: No, you can't take Po away from me. No, no. I want a second opinion.
translation.ja: ポーを奪おうってか？ 別の意見も聞こう

translation.en: Shifu, open another scroll or something.
Fine, a third opinion. Monkey? Viper? Tigress?
translation.ja: モンキー ヘビ タイガー 君らの意見は？

translation.en: Dad, you heard what Shifu said Oogway said. This guy can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.ja: カイを止められるのは 気功の使い手だけなんだよ

translation.en: And I can only master chi by knowing who I really am.
translation.ja: 使い手になるには 自分を知らなきゃ

translation.en: I'll pack you a lunch for the road.
Do you really think Po can master chi in time?
translation.ja: ポーは間に合うと思います？

translation.en: Doesn't matter what I think. It only matters what the universe thinks.
translation.ja: 私ではなく 宇宙がどう思うかが重要だ

translation.en: Master, what are we going to do?
You are going to find out where Kai is.
Follow the trail of those jade creatures. But do not engage
translation.ja: ただし戦ってはならんぞ

translation.en: for with every foe he faces, Kai becomes stronger.
translation.ja: マスターと戦えば カイは強くなる

translation.en: Why me? Is it because I asked?
No. It is because you can fly. Go!
translation.ja: 空を飛べるからだ 行け

translation.en: Should have kept your beak shut. [chuckles]
What? Oh, man. Is it because I...
-Ah... You don't need to ask me twice. -[muffled] Ow.
What am I doing? Getting a backache. Did you have to step on every rock?
translation.ja: 腰を痛めたところだ わざと悪路を通ったな

translation.en: No, I mean, why are you here?
What was I supposed to do, huh? What if the pandas don't have food you like?
translation.ja: パンダの食べ物が 口に合わなかったら？

translation.en: You're never gonna be able to save the world on an empty stomach.
translation.ja: 腹ぺこじゃ 世界を救えないだろ

translation.en: I consider my presence mission critical.
translation.ja: だからワシが必要なんだ
しかし他人に 村の場所を知られては困る

translation.en: We can't share the location of the village with others. So...
translation.ja: しかし他人に 村の場所を知られては困る だから…

translation.en: Well, you think I can't keep a secret, huh?
translation.ja: ワシには秘密が守れないと？

translation.en: I raised Po for 20 years before I finally told him he was adopted.
translation.ja: ポーが養子だってこと 20年間 隠し通したんだぞ

translation.en: Okay. I guess it would be cruel to make you fly back.
translation.ja: 飛んで帰れと言うのも 酷だしな

translation.en: Sure looks like a long ways up there.
We're pandas. We don't do stairs.
I've waited my whole life to hear those words.
This is the secret panda village?
translation.ja: ここが秘密のパンダ村か？

translation.en: No wonder you keep it a secret. If I lived here, I wouldn't tell anyone either.
translation.ja: これじゃ秘密にしたくもなる 見られたくないよな
さあ ここで“うわぁ”だ

translation.en: Everyone! Everyone, gather around! This is my son!
translation.ja: 集まってくれ これが おれの息子だ

translation.en: -I'm Meng Meng. -I'm Shuai Shuai. -Your fur is soft. -He smells like cookies.
translation.ja: ねえ クッキーのニオイがする

translation.en: He's so handsome, just like his father.
translation.ja: 男前だね　父親そっくりだ

translation.en: Son, these are your cousins. Dim and Sum.
translation.ja: お前のいとこだぞ テンとシンだ

translation.en: Ah... We'll make you another one.

translation.ja: どうも　すごいハグだね

translation.en: I don't know who you are.

translation.ja: シマシマ赤ちゃん かわいい

translation.en: Okay, careful with that. That's my action figure.
translation.ja: それ 僕のフィギュア…

translation.en: ...problem. Of course. Yeah. That's why I brought her.
translation.ja: もちろんさ プレゼントだよ　大事にね

translation.en: -Take good care of her. -Yes! Stripy Baby. [giggles]
translation.ja: もちろんさ プレゼントだよ　大事にね シマシマ赤ちゃん

translation.en: You look just like me, but a baby.
translation.ja: 僕にそっくりなのに 赤ちゃん
あなたは おばあさん
僕よりも もっとデブ
みんな 僕にそっくり

translation.en: Let's feast in my son's honor.
translation.ja: 食べるぞ　息子の祝いだ
パンダは歩かない 転がるんだ！

translation.en: Have you ever seen anyone look so ridiculous?
Po, what are you doing? Po!
You're right, that is better than walking.
What kind of panda doesn't know how to roll?
Well, I'm kind of new at this whole "being a panda" thing.
Hey, what kind of panda are you? You have a funny neck.
translation.ja: おじさんは何パンダ？ 首が長いね

translation.en: I'm not a panda at all.
-What's that? What's that? -My hat. My beak. -What's that? -My wing.
translation.ja: 帽子　クチバシ　翼

translation.en: No more questions! Go away, kid.
Here, son. I packed your chopsticks.
These? These are chopsticks. They're for picking up dumplings.
translation.ja: 箸さ　肉まんをつまむ

translation.en: You mean you only eat one at a time?
I knew I wasn't eating up to my potential!
translation.ja: もっと力がある気がしてた

translation.en: Wow, she's amazing. She's so beautiful.
translation.ja: “ステキだな とっても美しい”

translation.en: But please, try to save all other compliments until after the performance.
translation.ja: ほかの褒め言葉は 踊りの後にして

translation.en: Best ribbon dancer in the world!
translation.ja: 世界一のリボンのダンスだ

translation.en: At least, that's what she said.

translation.ja: だけど目が釘付けなのね

translation.en: Dad, why does she keep staring at me like... that!
translation.ja: 彼女 何で僕を ずっと見てるのかな

translation.en: I don't really know how to dance!
Of course, you do. All pandas dance.
translation.ja: 踊れないパンダなんて いない

translation.en: -I know what you were thinking. -You do?
"How can one panda be so beautiful?"
-Help me, Dads. -Yeah, no, you're on your own.
Don't worry. You'll get the hang of it.
I have so much to learn.
Just because you say "Wings of" before something, it doesn't mean that you're doing a special move.
translation.ja: すぐ“何ちゃらの翼”って言う

translation.en: It's like me saying "Antenna of Power"
translation.ja: おれなら“力の触覚”とか―
“サンドイッチを作るカマ” とかだな

translation.en: Master Bear, Master Chicken, Master Croc! What are you doing out here?
translation.ja: マスターのお三方 どうしたんです？

translation.en: [squawks] Jade creatures attacked our villages. We've tracked them here.
translation.ja: 村を襲った翡翠の化け物を 追ってきた
シーフー老師は戦うなと…

translation.en: -We've gotta get in there. -But Master Shifu said...

translation.ja: マスター･チキンも行くんだぞ

translation.en: Even Master Chicken's going in there! And he's a chicken.
translation.ja: マスター･チキンも行くんだぞ 腰抜け(チキン)なのに

translation.en: -That's it. I'm going in. -Mantis! We have orders not to...
translation.ja: おれは行く でも命令が…

translation.en: They need our help! Come on. I'll go high, you go low.
translation.ja: 助けなきゃ！ お前は上から行け

translation.en: Fear the bug! All right, you little...
translation.ja: カマキリパワーだ いいか 覚悟しろ

translation.en: Antenna of Power! Ah! It didn't work!
translation.ja: 力の触覚！ 効かねえ

translation.en: Just like your friend... the bug.
translation.ja: お前の友達もな 虫のヤツだ

translation.en: Don't worry, little birdie. I'll put your chi to good use...
translation.ja: 小鳥ちゃん お前の気は大切に使ってやる

translation.en: destroying the Jade Palace and everyone in it.
translation.ja: 翡翠城と そこにいる者を 粉々にするのにな

translation.en: Oh, yeah. First day of panda training!
I'm ready for my first day of panda training.
translation.ja: パンダ訓練の初日だよ

translation.en: -What? -You know, learn to be a panda, master chi, save the world!
translation.ja: 気功を操り 世界を救わなきゃ
パンダは昼過ぎまで寝る

translation.en: So lesson number one is, "Go back to bed."
Nobody said this was gonna be easy.
Can you do this? Can you do that?
How about this? How about that?
Am I doing it? Is this good?

translation.ja: いくぞ　カッバーン
おばあちゃん 危な…

translation.en: You gotta let the hill tell you where to roll.
Dim, Sum, let's show him how we go uphill!
translation.ja: テン シン 山の登り方を教えてやれ

translation.en: What are you doing there? That food is for Po!

translation.ja: よしよし いい子だ

translation.en: Just let yourself fall into it.
There we go. Just let it all out.
Let me get some of that.
What are you guys looking at?

translation.ja: それでこそパンダだ 飛び込め！

translation.en: Now, you try again. But don't try so hard.
translation.ja: もう一度 やってみろ 頑張るなよ

translation.en: You know, just for, you know, showing me what it feels like
translation.ja: いろいろと教えてくれてさ

translation.en: -So, when do you think I'll be ready? -Ready?
translation.ja: そろそろいいでしょ？ いい？

translation.en: You know, to learn how to master chi.
Come on, I wanna show you something else. Come on.
translation.ja: 違うことを教えてやる

translation.en: Sorry about the mess. I don't usually get visitors.
translation.ja: 散らかってて すまん 普段は客も来ないんでな

translation.en: I had this done on your 100th day.
translation.ja: お前の“お食い初め”の 記念だよ

translation.en: Your momma couldn't hold you still. You nearly ate the paper. [chuckles]
translation.ja: お前はじっとしてなくて その絵も食べかけた
母さんは完ぺきだったな

translation.en: She was the love of my life.
And then, just when I thought I couldn't get any luckier,
translation.ja: しかも もう１つ 大きな幸せが訪れた

translation.en: along you came. My Little Lotus.
translation.ja: かわいいシャオレンを 授かったんだ
だがあの日 一瞬にして
おれは すべてを失った

translation.en: You don't have to worry about losing me ever again.
translation.ja: 僕はもう いなくなったりしないよ

translation.en: Let me get some of that.
Master Lizard, Master Ox, Master Eagle. All of them.
translation.ja: マスター･トカゲ マスター･ウシ　マスター･ワシ 全員だ

translation.en: In every village from the sea to here, every master in China...
translation.ja: 海からここまでの すべての村で マスターたちが

translation.en: -Maybe they are all at a party. -Monkey.
translation.ja: パーティーとか モンキー
カイが気を盗んだのだ

translation.en: We are all that stand between him...
and the knowledge Oogway left in our care.
translation.ja: ウーグウェイ導師の叡智(えいち)を 守らねば

translation.en: How dare you set foot on these grounds!
translation.ja: ぬけぬけと ここに来るとは

translation.en: Groveling at the feet of Oogway the Magnificent.
translation.ja: お偉いウーグウェイの足元に ひれ伏してる

translation.en: You are not fit to speak his name.
translation.ja: 汚れた者は口をつぐめ

translation.en: I am not fit, little kitten?
translation.ja: 手厳しいな 子猫ちゃん

translation.en: I fought by his side. I loved him like a brother.
translation.ja: 常にヤツと共に戦い 兄弟のように思っていた
だがヤツは おれを裏切ったのだ

translation.en: Now I will destroy everything he has created!
translation.ja: ヤツが造ったものは すべて たたき壊す

translation.en: How's that for a little kitten?
I will not let you destroy Oogway's memory.
translation.ja: 導師の思い出は壊させん
ヤツは おれのを壊した

translation.en: Mantis. It is me, your bestie!
translation.ja: おれだよ　マブダチだろ
ごめん ごめん ごめん
ポーに知らせろ ですが…

translation.en: I will show you the true power of chi, brother.
translation.ja: いいか 兄弟よ 真の“気の力”を見せてやる

translation.en: [chuckles] Hmm, what do you say, Oogway? Do you forgive him?
translation.ja: ウーグウェイ こいつを許すか？

translation.en: You may have destroyed the Jade Palace, but you will never succeed.
translation.ja: 翡翠城は破壊できても お前の望みはかなわん

translation.en: There will always be someone to stop you.
translation.ja: お前を止める者が 必ず現れる

translation.en: His chi is strong... but it won't be enough.
translation.ja: ヤツの気も強いが おれの敵ではない

translation.en: He will meet the same fate as you.
translation.ja: 貴様と同じ運命を たどることになる

translation.en: -No. -And so will every panda in that village.
translation.ja: あの村のパンダも 全員 道連れにしてやるさ
ポー あなたが頼りよ
シャオレン 踊って
これぞパンダのハグだ
おっきいシマシマ赤ちゃん

translation.en: He's taken every master in China, including Shifu and the others. It's all gone, Po. Everything. Everyone.
translation.ja: 中国全土のマスターたちが 全員 気を盗まれてしまった

translation.en: And now he's on his way here. He's after you, Po.
translation.ja: カイが来るわ 狙いは あなたと ここのパンダたち
狙いは あなたと ここのパンダたち
猶予は？ あまりない もう気を操れる？

translation.en: Please, tell me you've mastered chi.
translation.ja: あまりない もう気を操れる？

translation.en: You need to teach me the secret chi technique now!
No, no, I'm afraid you need more time.
Everyone, go get your things! Let me help you with that.
I don't have more time. I need to learn it now!
-I am ready. -Not quite. What are you talking about? I've done everything you've asked.
translation.ja: 言われたことは 全部 クリアしたよ

translation.en: I've mastered napping, sleeping in, hammocks, hot tubs.
translation.ja: 昼寝 寝坊 ハンモックに お風呂も

translation.en: I am totally at one with my panda parts. Now why won't you show me?
translation.ja: パンダらしさは 完ぺきなのに…

translation.en: -You what? -I don't know it, okay? No one does.
translation.ja: 何て？ 村の者は誰も知らない 昔は達人でも…

translation.en: Maybe we used to. But... But not anymore.
translation.ja: 村の者は誰も知らない 昔は達人でも… 今は違う
ウソを？ 違う　ただ…

translation.en: I find out some blade-swinging maniac is coming for you.
translation.ja: イカれたヤツが お前を狙ってるんだぞ

translation.en: What am I supposed to do? Just let that happen?
translation.ja: イカれたヤツが お前を狙ってるんだぞ ほっておけと？

translation.en: Yes! I'm the Dragon Warrior. Facing maniacs, that's my job!
translation.ja: 僕は龍の戦士 イカれ野郎と戦うのが仕事だ

translation.en: But because of you, I left the Valley unprotected.
translation.ja: でも父さんのせいで 僕は村を離れ―

translation.en: I left my friends unprotected! And now they're all...
translation.ja: その間に友達が襲われた

translation.en: -They're all... -And you would have been, too.
translation.ja: みんなは… お前が心配なんだ

translation.en: I am not going to lose you again. I can't.
translation.ja: もう二度と お前を 失うわけにはいかない

translation.en: Po, I'm so worried for you that I can't even enjoy being right about everything.
translation.ja: ポー よかった すごく心配してたんだぞ

translation.en: Now run, run, run, as fast as those chubby legs can go!
translation.ja: とにかく急いで逃げろ

translation.en: But what are you going to do?
I'm gonna stay, and fight that monster.
translation.ja: ここに残って怪物と戦う

translation.en: Po, he may be a monster, but he's still your father.
translation.ja: 彼は怪物だが あれでも父親だぞ

translation.en: You know, you weren't the only one who was lying.
translation.ja: ウソをついてたのは あんただけじゃない

translation.en: -Oh? -I didn't really come along because I was worried Po would go hungry.
translation.ja: ワシが来た理由は ポーの食い物じゃなく

translation.en: I was worried you'd steal Po from me.
translation.ja: ポーを奪われないかと…

translation.en: But I realize having you in Po's life doesn't mean less for me.
translation.ja: ワシの人生が 減るわけじゃなく ポーの人生が 豊かになるってことなのに
ポーの人生が 豊かになるってことなのに

translation.en: Well, I'm not in his life.
translation.ja: でも― あの子を失ってしまった
あの子を失ってしまった

translation.en: Your son got mad at you. Welcome to parenthood.
translation.ja: 息子を怒らせたから？ まさしく親だ

translation.en: You don't understand. I lied to him.
translation.ja: あの子にウソをついたんだ

translation.en: I lied to him for 20 years.
translation.ja: ワシは20年 ウソをつき

translation.en: He still thinks he came from an egg.
translation.ja: 卵で生まれたとさえ言ったよ

translation.en: Sometimes, we do the wrong things for the right reasons.
translation.ja: 親は時に 子供かわいさで過ちを犯す
今 あの子は 傷つき混乱しているが

translation.en: And he still has to save the world.
translation.ja: 世界を救わねばならない

translation.en: -This isn't going to work. -It has to.
translation.ja: こんなのムダよ やらなきゃ

translation.en: I've seen Kai. I've seen what he can do.
translation.ja: 私はカイの力を見たわ

translation.en: But he hasn't seen what I can do.
translation.ja: ヤツは僕の力を見てない

translation.en: It's my best move. I just have to get to Kai, grab his finger and then skadoosh! Back to the Spirit Realm.
translation.ja: この必殺技でシュカボーンさ ヤツを魂の王国へ帰す

translation.en: He has an army of jade warriors.
translation.ja: 彼は翡翠の軍団から 情報を得てる

translation.en: Everything they see, he sees. So there's no sneaking up on him.
translation.ja: 彼は翡翠の軍団から 情報を得てる 指固めをしようにも 近づけない

translation.en: -You will never get close enough. -It's gonna work!
translation.ja: 指固めをしようにも 近づけない 何とかなる

translation.en: He can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.ja: 気功でなければムリよ

translation.en: Oh, you sound just like Shifu with the, "Chi, chi, chi." "Chi this. Chi that." "Chi, chi, chi!"
translation.ja: シーフー老師みたいに 気 気 気って そればっかり

translation.en: I'm not a master of chi, okay?
translation.ja: 僕は気功を使えず 龍の戦士かも怪しい

translation.en: I don't know if I'm the Dragon Warrior. I don't even know if I'm a panda!
translation.ja: 僕は気功を使えず 龍の戦士かも怪しい パンダかすら…

translation.en: I don't know who I am!
You're right. There's no way I can stop him and his army.
translation.ja: これじゃカイの軍団は 倒せない

translation.en: Unless you had an army of your own.
translation.ja: お前にも軍団があればいい

translation.en: I finally found my son, after all these years.
translation.ja: 長い年月を経て やっと息子を見つけた

translation.en: It's going to take a lot more than the end of the world to keep us apart.
translation.ja: 世界の終わりが来ても もう離れない

translation.en: But you don't even know kung fu.
What? I can't teach you kung fu.
translation.ja: ムリに決まってるだろ

translation.en: I couldn't even teach Tigress. And she already knows kung fu!
translation.ja: カンフーの達人にさえ 教えられないのに

translation.en: Po, I know I'm the last guy you wanna trust right now.
translation.ja: 今は 父さんのことを 信じたくないだろうが

translation.en: But you gotta believe me. We can do this.
translation.ja: それでも信じてくれ 必ずやれる

translation.en: We can learn kung fu. We can be just like you!
translation.ja: みんなでカンフーを学び お前のように戦えるよ

translation.en: Uh... "We can be just like you"?
But you don't have to be!
That's what Shifu meant. I don't have to turn you into me. I have to turn you into you!
translation.ja: シーフー老師が言った “本当のお前にしたい”って
父さんズ お役に立てたかな…

translation.en: I'm gonna do something I never thought I'd be able to do.
translation.ja: ムリだと思ったことをやるよ

translation.en: You guys, your real strength comes from being the best "you" you can be.
translation.ja: 真の自分になった時 力は発揮される

translation.en: What are you good at? What do you love?
translation.ja: 何が得意だ？ 好きなことは？
そうだ いいぞ　続けて
いいぞ　その調子だ
もっと速くリボンを操れ

translation.en: Hug that log, you! Hug that log like it's the last time you're ever gonna hug it goodbye forever.
translation.ja: もっとハグしろ 二度と会えない相手だと思え

translation.en: Higher! And a little more to the left this time. You can do it!
translation.ja: もっと高く もうちょい左だ

translation.en: I don't wanna see any of these hit the ground!
Good! Now try it with these.
translation.ja: いいよ　次はこれで

translation.en: Okay, pay attention because I'm only gonna go over this ten more times.
translation.ja: あと10回しか言わないよ よく聞いて

translation.en: The only entrance to the village is here.
translation.ja: 村への入り口はここだけ

translation.en: The dumpling squadron will take position here,
while the cookie squadron will take position here.
translation.ja: クッキー部隊はこっち

translation.en: Now, on my signal, the two squadrons will...
translation.ja: 僕の合図で２つの部隊が…

translation.en: Okay. Anyway, the important thing to remember is that this is the spot where...
translation.ja: まあ いいや とにかく重要なのは この…

translation.en: If you only remember one thing, it's distract the jombies
translation.ja: みんなは ゾンビスイを邪魔して

translation.en: until I get close enough to put a Wuxi Finger Hold on Kai.
translation.ja: その隙(すき)に 僕がカイに指固めをする

translation.en: Pandas on three! One, two three, Pan...
You guys... Never mind, I'll teach you that later.
translation.ja: みんな いいよ　後で教える

translation.en: I wish I could have taught you this, son.
translation.ja: お前に気功を教えられれば よかったが…

translation.en: That's what I call a Dramatic Entrance!
Ha ha! You must be the Dragon Warrior.
Beast of Vengeance, Maker of Widows!
translation.ja: またの名を“復讐の野獣” “旦那キラー”
知ってるヤツがいた ありがとう

translation.en: Almost makes me wanna spare your life.
You wanna spare me? How about you spare me the chit-chat? All right? Let's do this.
translation.ja: そんなムダ話はいいから さっさとブチかまそう

translation.en: I'm going to take your chi, then the chi of every panda in the...
translation.ja: お前の気を吸い取ってやる この村のパンダも…
減らず口の ぶよぶよパンダめ

translation.en: Oh, no. It's true. You guys have all been turned green!
translation.ja: ホントだ みんな緑色になってる

translation.en: Except for you, Mantis. You were already green.
translation.ja: カマキリは元から緑だけど

translation.en: Spring Roll Squad! Time for some takeout!
translation.ja: 春巻き部隊 サクッと仕上げて
ゾンビスイ おいで

translation.en: I don't know who you are, either.
Get ready to dance... with danger!
translation.ja: 危険と踊るわよ　覚悟して

translation.en: Sorry, buddy. Gotta send you back to the Spirit Realm.
translation.ja: 魂の王国へ帰ってもらうよ

translation.en: Okay, that didn't work. Let me try one more time.
translation.ja: 効かない？ もう一度 いくね

translation.en: Skadoosh! Skadoosh. Skadoosh. Skadoo... What the...
translation.ja: シュカボーン！ シュカボーン　シュカボ…

translation.en: [chuckles] No, it's not. Did Oogway teach you that little trick?
translation.ja: いや 効かないな ウーグウェイが教えたのか？

translation.en: Too bad. It only works on mortals.
translation.ja: それは生き物にしか効かない

translation.en: And I am a Spirit Warrior.
translation.ja: おれは すでに魂だけの戦士だ
僕が間違ってた　ごめん
僕が間違ってた　ごめん みんな逃げて！

translation.en: this was the one destined to stop me?
translation.ja: こいつが おれを止める運命の男か？
まず こいつの気を奪い
次に 残りの全員だ

translation.en: You really thought you could send me back to the Spirit Realm?
translation.ja: おれ様を魂の王国へ 送り返せると思ってたのか？

translation.en: You are just a stupid mortal.

translation.ja: 生き物にしか効かない…

translation.en: You're right. I can't send you there.
But I can take you there.

translation.ja: 何があった？ ポーは？

translation.en: He took Kai away. He saved us.
translation.ja: カイを連れ去り 村を助けたの

translation.en: He saved us, but who's saving him?
translation.ja: ポーのことは 誰が助けるんだ？
魂の王国だ　成功した
おれを連れ戻したのか

translation.en: Don't blame me. I tried to finish this in the regular realm.
translation.ja: 普通の王国で終わろうと…
頑張れ 息子よ 戦え！

translation.en: We have to help him! Okay. Everyone gather around.
That's it. Come in close. Come on.
You taught us who we were meant to be.
translation.ja: 自分が何者か お前に教えられた

translation.en: I've been asking the same question.
Am I the son of a panda?
Get it? See the giant dragon?
translation.ja: ほら この龍が見える？

translation.en: Get ready to feel the thunder.
Perhaps a bit of lunch. Because I'm starving.
translation.ja: もう昼かな　腹減った

translation.en: It took me 500 years to take Oogway's chi.
translation.ja: おれは500年かけて ウーグウェイの気を奪った

translation.en: I will have yours if it takes me 500 more.
translation.ja: もう500年かけても お前の気を奪う
ぺちゃくちゃ　うるさいな

translation.en: You want my chi so bad...

translation.ja: よし 力は おれのものだ
待て　よせ 大きすぎる
大きすぎる ダメだ

translation.en: I'm still green! It didn't work!
Oh, wait. That's my normal green.
translation.ja: 待った　元から緑だった

translation.en: Not a baby. Not a baby!
I know, right? It's like the best cape ever. When I run with it, then it looks really cool.
translation.ja: 知ってます マントもヒラヒラして最高
よく似合う　成長した

translation.en: Yep. I gotta lay off the panda buffet.
translation.ja: パンダ村で食べ過ぎて

translation.en: as I hoped you would when I sent the message to your father.
translation.ja: 父上に知らせを送った時 期待したとおりだ

translation.en: [gasps] You sent the universe mail. Whoa!

translation.ja: 宇宙が君を必要とした

translation.en: You finally became the panda you were always meant to be.
translation.ja: 君は運命が示したとおりの パンダになりました

translation.en: But, how'd you know I could?
On the first day we met, I saw the future of kung fu.
translation.ja: 君に出会った時 私はカンフーの未来を見た

translation.en: I saw the panda who could unite them both.
translation.ja: その２つを 結びつけられるパンダ

translation.en: That is why I chose you, Po.
translation.ja: それが君だったのです

translation.en: Both sides of a Yin and Yang.
translation.ja: 陰と陽の両面を 持つ者こそが―
僕に？ もらえませんよ

translation.en: Just take it. I have a bigger one.
translation.ja: 私には もっと大きいのがある

translation.en: I mean, you're enlightened and everything. I'm just...
translation.ja: だけど導師の後継者が 僕なんかじゃ…
待って　行かないで

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere. I live here.
translation.ja: 行きませんよ ここの住人ですから

translation.en: It's you who must decide whether to stay or go.
translation.ja: 君は行くか残るかを 決めるのです
どうでしょうね 試してみては？
父さんに 父さん　父さんズ！

translation.en: Don't you go disappearing in petals ever again.
translation.ja: 二度と花びらの中に消えるな
みんなが助けてくれた

translation.en: The student has truly become the tea...
Wait. Where did you get that?
Oh, this. Oogway gave it to me in the Spirit Realm.
translation.ja: 向こうの国で導師にもらった
気功をマスターしたかも
